Title: Page Template Guide
Description: Use this template to understand how to create dynamic pages. Duplicate this page and customize each section for your needs.
heading: How to Build Your Page
sections:
[{"type":"text","title":"📝 Text Section - Welcome Message","content":"

How to use this section: Text sections are perfect for introductions, explanations, and body content. Replace this text with your own welcome message or introduction.

What to change: Update the title above and replace this content with your message. You can use bold, italic, and other HTML formatting.

Best for: Hero sections, about us content, service descriptions, or any written content.

"},{"type":"features","title":"⭐ Features Section - Highlight Your Services","description":"This section showcases your key features, services, or benefits in a grid layout","features":[{"title":"Feature 1","description":"Replace this with your first key feature or service. Keep it concise and benefits-focused.","icon":"✨"},{"title":"Feature 2","description":"Add your second feature here. Choose emojis that represent your service visually.","icon":"🚀"},{"title":"Feature 3","description":"Third feature goes here. Aim for 3-6 features for the best visual balance.","icon":"💡"},{"title":"Feature 4","description":"Optional fourth feature. You can add or remove features as needed.","icon":"🎯"},{"title":"Feature 5","description":"Optional fifth feature. Consider what matters most to your customers.","icon":"🛡️"},{"title":"Feature 6","description":"Optional sixth feature. Focus on unique selling points and benefits.","icon":"📈"}]},{"type":"text","title":"📄 Text Section - About Your Business","content":"

Section Purpose: Use this for detailed explanations about your business, services, or process.

How to customize: Change the title to match your content (e.g., 'About Us', 'Our Process', 'Why Choose Us'). Replace this text with your business story, methodology, or detailed service information.

Tips: Keep paragraphs short for better readability. Use bullet points or numbered lists when appropriate.

"},{"type":"image","imageUrl":"https://via.placeholder.com/800x400/4F46E5/FFFFFF?text=Replace+with+your+image","alt":"Replace with descriptive alt text for your image","caption":"📸 Image Section: Replace this placeholder with your business photo, product image, or relevant visual. Update the caption to describe your image."},{"type":"testimonials","title":"💬 Testimonials Section - Customer Reviews","testimonials":[{"name":"Customer Name 1","avatar":"https://via.placeholder.com/100x100/FF6B6B/FFFFFF?text=C1","role":"Customer Title","company":"Company Name","content":"Replace this with an actual customer testimonial. Focus on specific benefits and results your service provided."},{"name":"Customer Name 2","avatar":"https://via.placeholder.com/100x100/4ECDC4/FFFFFF?text=C2","role":"Customer Title","company":"Company Name","content":"Add a second testimonial here. Include the customer's role and company for credibility."},{"name":"Customer Name 3","avatar":"https://via.placeholder.com/100x100/45B7D1/FFFFFF?text=C3","role":"Customer Title","company":"Company Name","content":"Third testimonial. You can add more or use fewer testimonials. 3-5 works well for most pages."}]},{"type":"gallery","title":"🖼️ Gallery Section - Showcase Your Work","images":[{"url":"https://via.placeholder.com/400x300/FF6B6B/FFFFFF?text=Your+Photo+1","alt":"Description of first image","caption":"Replace with your work sample 1"},{"url":"https://via.placeholder.com/400x300/4ECDC4/FFFFFF?text=Your+Photo+2","alt":"Description of second image","caption":"Replace with your work sample 2"},{"url":"https://via.placeholder.com/400x300/45B7D1/FFFFFF?text=Your+Photo+3","alt":"Description of third image","caption":"Replace with your work sample 3"},{"url":"https://via.placeholder.com/400x300/96CEB4/FFFFFF?text=Your+Photo+4","alt":"Description of fourth image","caption":"Replace with your work sample 4"},{"url":"https://via.placeholder.com/400x300/FECA57/FFFFFF?text=Your+Photo+5","alt":"Description of fifth image","caption":"Replace with your work sample 5"},{"url":"https://via.placeholder.com/400x300/FF9FF3/FFFFFF?text=Your+Photo+6","alt":"Description of sixth image","caption":"Replace with your work sample 6"}]},{"type":"faq","title":"❓ FAQ Section - Answer Common Questions","faqs":[{"question":"Replace with your most common customer question?","answer":"Provide a clear, helpful answer here. Think about what customers ask you most often and address those concerns."},{"question":"What about pricing/process/timeline?","answer":"Answer questions about your pricing, process, or timeline. Be transparent and helpful to build trust."},{"question":"How do I get started/contact you?","answer":"Explain your onboarding process or how customers can begin working with you. Make it easy for them to take the next step."}]},{"email":"your-email@business.com","description":"📞 Contact Section: Update this description with your call-to-action. Example: 'Ready to start your project? Get in touch today!'","address":"Your Business Address, City, State ZIP","title":"Get In Touch","type":"contact","phone":"+1 (Your) Phone-Number"},{"description":"Replace this with your call-to-action message. What do you want visitors to do next?","buttonText":"Your Button Text","title":"🎯 CTA Section - Your Call to Action","type":"cta","buttonLink":"/your-signup-or-contact-page"},{"type":"text","title":"📋 Instructions for Using This Template","content":"

How to use this template:

  1. Duplicate this page in your Wix Collections
  2. Change the slug to your desired URL (e.g., 'about-us', 'services')
  3. Update the page title and heading at the top
  4. Customize each section by replacing the placeholder content with your own
  5. Remove sections you don't need or rearrange them in your preferred order
  6. Add more sections by copying and pasting section blocks

Section Types Available: Text, Features, Image, Gallery, Testimonials, FAQ, Contact, CTA

Remember: Delete this instruction section when you're done customizing your page!

"}]

Title: About Us
Description: Learn more about our company, our mission, and the team behind our success.
heading: About Our Company
sections:
[{"type":"text","title":"Our Story","content":"

Welcome to our company! We started with a simple mission: to provide exceptional products and services that make a real difference in our customers' lives.

Founded in 2020, we've grown from a small startup to a trusted partner for businesses and individuals across the country. Our commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction drives everything we do.

"},{"type":"image","imageUrl":"https://via.placeholder.com/800x400/2563EB/FFFFFF?text=Team+Photo","alt":"Our team working together","caption":"Our dedicated team working together to serve our customers"},{"type":"text","title":"Our Mission","content":"

We believe that great products and exceptional service can transform businesses and improve lives. Our mission is to deliver solutions that are not only effective but also accessible and reliable.

Every day, we strive to exceed expectations and build lasting relationships with our customers, partners, and community.

"},{"type":"features","title":"What Sets Us Apart","description":"The core values that guide our work and define our company culture","features":[{"title":"Customer First","description":"Every decision we make starts with our customers' needs and success in mind.","icon":"🎯"},{"title":"Quality Excellence","description":"We never compromise on quality and continuously improve our products and services.","icon":"⭐"},{"title":"Innovation","description":"We embrace new technologies and creative solutions to solve complex challenges.","icon":"💡"},{"title":"Integrity","description":"We conduct business with honesty, transparency, and ethical practices.","icon":"🤝"}]},{"type":"testimonials","title":"What Our Customers Say","testimonials":[{"name":"Sarah Johnson","avatar":"https://via.placeholder.com/100x100/10B981/FFFFFF?text=SJ","role":"Business Owner","company":"Johnson & Associates","content":"Working with this company has been a game-changer for our business. Their attention to detail and commitment to our success is unmatched."},{"name":"Michael Chen","avatar":"https://via.placeholder.com/100x100/3B82F6/FFFFFF?text=MC","role":"Operations Manager","company":"Tech Solutions Inc","content":"The level of service and expertise they provide is exceptional. They truly understand our industry and deliver results that exceed expectations."}]},{"type":"cta","title":"Ready to Work Together?","description":"We'd love to learn more about your needs and how we can help you achieve your goals.","buttonText":"Get in Touch","buttonLink":"/contact-us"}]

Title: Contact Us
Description: Get in touch with us today. We're here to help and answer any questions you may have.
heading: Contact Us
sections:
[{"type":"text","title":"Get in Touch","content":"

We're here to help! Whether you have questions about our products, need support, or want to discuss a potential partnership, we'd love to hear from you.

Our team typically responds to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days. For urgent matters, please call us directly.

"},{"type":"contact","title":"Contact Information","description":"Reach out to us through any of the following methods","email":"hello@yourcompany.com","phone":"+1 (555) 123-4567","address":"123 Business Ave, Suite 100, Your City, ST 12345"},{"type":"text","title":"Business Hours","content":"

Monday - Friday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM

Saturday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM

Sunday: Closed

Holiday hours may vary. Please call ahead during holiday periods.

"},{"type":"faq","title":"Quick Answers","faqs":[{"question":"What's the best way to reach you?","answer":"Email is usually the fastest way to get a detailed response. For urgent matters or immediate assistance, please call us during business hours."},{"question":"How quickly do you respond?","answer":"We aim to respond to all emails within 24 hours during business days. Phone calls are typically answered immediately during business hours."},{"question":"Do you offer consultations?","answer":"Yes! We offer free initial consultations to discuss your needs and how we can help. Contact us to schedule a convenient time."}]},{"type":"cta","title":"Prefer to Call?","description":"Speak with our team directly for immediate assistance","buttonText":"Call Now: (555) 123-4567","buttonLink":"tel:+15551234567"}]

Title: How To & FAQ
Description: Find answers to common questions and learn how to get the most out of our products and services.
heading: How To & Frequently Asked Questions
sections:
[{"type":"text","title":"How Can We Help?","content":"

Welcome to our help center! Here you'll find answers to the most common questions and step-by-step guides to help you succeed.

Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team - we're always happy to help!

"},{"type":"faq","title":"Getting Started","faqs":[{"question":"How do I get started?","answer":"Getting started is easy! First, contact us to discuss your needs. We'll then provide a customized proposal and guide you through our onboarding process step by step."},{"question":"What information do I need to provide?","answer":"We'll need some basic information about your business, your goals, and any specific requirements you have. Don't worry - we'll walk you through everything during our initial consultation."},{"question":"How long does the setup process take?","answer":"Setup time varies depending on your specific needs, but most clients are up and running within 1-2 weeks. We'll provide a detailed timeline during your consultation."}]},{"type":"faq","title":"Billing & Pricing","faqs":[{"question":"How does pricing work?","answer":"Our pricing is customized based on your specific needs and requirements. Contact us for a free consultation and personalized quote."},{"question":"What payment methods do you accept?","answer":"We accept all major credit cards, bank transfers, and can set up invoicing for business accounts. Payment terms are flexible to meet your needs."},{"question":"Are there any setup fees?","answer":"Setup fees vary depending on the complexity of your project. We'll provide full transparency on all costs upfront with no hidden fees."}]},{"type":"faq","title":"Support & Maintenance","faqs":[{"question":"What kind of support do you provide?","answer":"We provide comprehensive support including phone, email, and online chat during business hours. We also offer detailed documentation and video tutorials."},{"question":"Do you offer training?","answer":"Yes! We provide training for your team to ensure you can make the most of our products and services. Training can be conducted in-person or remotely."},{"question":"What if something goes wrong?","answer":"We're here to help! Contact our support team immediately and we'll work to resolve any issues quickly. Most problems can be solved within a few hours."}]},{"type":"text","title":"Step-by-Step Guides","content":"

Quick Start Guide

  1. Contact Us - Reach out for your free consultation
  2. Discovery Call - We'll discuss your needs and goals
  3. Proposal - Receive your customized proposal
  4. Agreement - Sign the agreement and begin setup
  5. Launch - Go live with full support from our team

Best Practices

  • Keep your contact information up to date
  • Take advantage of our training resources
  • Reach out with questions early - we're here to help!
  • Provide feedback to help us serve you better
"},{"type":"contact","title":"Still Need Help?","description":"Our support team is standing by to assist you","email":"support@yourcompany.com","phone":"+1 (555) 123-4567","address":"For technical support, email is preferred for faster response times"},{"type":"cta","title":"Ready to Get Started?","description":"Have questions? Schedule a free consultation with our team","buttonText":"Schedule Consultation","buttonLink":"/contact-us"}]
